title.narrative: Small and Medium Enterprise Development Facility

description.narrative: The Project Development Objective is to improve access to finance (including term finance) for SMEs affected by the Global Financial Crisis in Sri Lanka.

condition.narrative: Finance Agreement :Section I G (a) | Description :The Recipient shall furnish to the Association for approval not later thanOctober 31 of each year, the annual work plan and budgetfor the Project for for each subsequent year of implementation. | Frequency:Yearly

Finance Agreement :Section I H | Description :The Recipient shall review jointly with the Association, every six (6) monthsthroughout Project implementation, the two (2) most recent Project Reports furnished to the Association | Frequency :Yearly

Finance Agreement :Section II A | Description :The Recipient shall monitor and evaluate the progress of the Project and prepareProject Reports covering one (1) calendar quarter not later than 45 days after the end of the period covered. | Frequency :Quarterly

Finance Agreement :Section II B (3) | Description :The Recipient shall have its Financial Statements audited. Each audit shallcover one fiscal year of the Recipient and be furnishednot later than six (6) months after the end of the period. | Frequency:Yearly
